originalTranscription: I'm climbing a mountain made entirely of clocks, each one ticking at a different speed and showing different times from around the world. The rocks are clock faces, the trees are pendulums swinging in breeze. Time itself seems fluid here - I can reach out and pull moments from the air like taffy, stretching them or compressing them. At the summit, all time converges into a single perfect moment where past, present, and future exist simultaneously in beautiful harmony.
summary: A mountain of clocks where time is tangible and malleable, allowing the dreamer to stretch moments like taffy and experience the convergence of all time at the summit.

scenes.text: The dreamer climbs a mountain constructed entirely of clocks ticking at different speeds, with rocks as clock faces and trees as swinging pendulums.
At the summit, all time converges into a single perfect moment where past, present, and future exist simultaneously in harmonious unity.

fragments: The discordant symphony of clocks ticking at different speeds.
The sensation of pulling time from the air like warm taffy.
